text: William Logie (20 September 1932 – 20 June 2016) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Cambuslang Rangers, Rangers, Aberdeen, Arbroath, Brechin City, and Alloa Athletic. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Canadian people of Scottish descent Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Footballers from Stirling Category:Association football wing halves Category:Cambuslang Rangers F.C. players Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Aberdeen F.C. players Category:Arbroath F.C. players Category:Brechin City F.C. players Category:Alloa Athletic F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players Category:Canadian expatriate soccer players Category:Canadian expatriate sportspeople in Scotland
title: Willie Logie
